document_data.mainbody:
Haemir Waelvor was an inhabitant of Myth Drannor in the 3 century DR, and a scion of house Waelvor.
He was cruel-faced.
Besides the spells he used to strike at Bhuraelea and Mladris, he meant to consume their lives to power his shield-sundering.
In , Haemir Waelvor was part of an attack on Mythanthors tower. He struck down the two sorceresses guarding the high mage, Bhuraelea and Mladris, in a surprise attack however, he was thwarted finally by Elminster, who had been present as some sort of phantom. He was finally slain by Mythanthor himself.
